Detailed Description

A bar plot data source.

Member Function Documentation

- (CPFill *) barFillForBarPlot: (CPBarPlot *)  barPlot
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 
[optional]

Gets a bar fill for the given bar plot. This method is optional.

Parameters:
barPlot The bar plot.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
The bar fill for the point with the given index.
- (CPTextLayer *) barLabelForBarPlot: (CPBarPlot *)  barPlot
recordIndex: (NSUInteger)  index 
[optional]

Gets a bar label for the given bar plot. This method is no longer used.

Parameters:
barPlot The bar plot.
index The data index of interest.
Returns:
The bar label for the point with the given index. If you return nil, the default bar label will be used. If you return an instance of NSNull, no label will be shown for the index in question.
Deprecated:
This method has been replaced by the CPPlotDataSource -dataLabelForPlot:recordIndex: method and is no longer used.
